ISSUE.TITLE: No localization for "Plugins.Widgets.GoogleAnalytics.IncludeCustomerId" and "Plugins.Widgets.GoogleAnalytics.UseJsToSendEcommerceInfo" fields for Google analytics plugin
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: Go to https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/Admin/WidgetsGoogleAnalytics/Configure and see that the fields are not localized Note that other locales of this plugin are not reflected in the upgrade script as well. For example we changed "Enable E-commerce" to "Enable eCommerce" but you won't see it until you reinstall the plugin. Add the following resources as well: admin.configuration.plugins.changesapplyafterreboot admin.configuration.plugins.discardchanges.progress admin.configuration.plugins.discardchanges admin.configuration.plugins.applychanges
